lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it helps people.

lender.name: Metropolitan Farms
lender.loan_because: Metropolitan Farms recently decided that we would donate all proceeds from the bar and the door at all our shows to Kiva. For free song downloads and concert dates, click the link below.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: I received a gift voucher and learned about it. I think it is a wonderful idea and it makes me feel good to know I am helping someone out there in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher - I teach sport and English and I love teenage kids

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I'm from a large family, had to work hard, & know what it is like. I want to help someone that is working to better themselves and their family.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: A religious man is a person who holds God and man in one thought at one time, at all times, who suffers harm done to others, whose greatest passion is compassion, whose greatest strength is love and defiance of despair. -Abraham Joshua Heschel

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: God feeds the birds, but he makes them fly for it.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: supporting a sense of community, alleviating suffering, and empowering others are the most important things I can do, even if I can only afford to do them in a minuscule way.
lender.occupational_info: I live on a farm near Essex, New York, USA where a neighbor grows wheat, corn, and hay without the use of chemicals that can harm the land.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: it is a small way in which I can help deserving people expand their businesses and care for their families.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: its the best way to help people without a handout. I belive that building the world's economy is the best way to promote health and happiness.
lender.occupational_info: Create television programming focused on the politics, sports and community event in and around Chicago, IL.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: in a small way, I'm hoping to make a difference in someone's life. The stories of these borrowers touch my heart!

lender.name: Todd Schmid
lender.loan_because: I believe social entrepreneurship is among the most effective means to achieving sustainability for many developing countries, and that collaboration and passion can produce surprising results.
lender.occupational_info:
I spent 2009-2010 as a U.S. Fulbright Fellow to Paraguay, where I met member's of Paraguay's Fundaci√≥n Paraguaya -- the nation's leading microfinance organization. I also co-own a design consultancy, Fields & Schmid LLP.
Currently, I am a 2L at the University of Illinois College of Law.

lender.loan_because: I have privileges these entrepreneurs do not simply because I was born in a different part of the world. Spare cash to me can be life changing to others
lender.occupational_info: Building and maintaining successful websites

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have the opportunity to share with others.

lender.name: Benjamin

lender.occupational_info: I study all of the time I learn about how I can make a difference in the world

lender.name: Jennie

lender.name: Penelope

lender.occupational_info: I write articles and take photographs for news publications about houses that are available for sale.

lender.name: Charlotte

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I have had many people throughout my life help in several ways at critical times. I want to do the same for people in my community and world wide.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a development group for a company that makes electron beam microscopes and focused ion beam milling machines. I also continue to work in and out of the performance motorcycle business.

lender.name: Sandi
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find the work they love.

lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs, mostly for websites and interactive multimedia.

lender.name: Rachel

lender.name: Global Cycling for KIVA
lender.loan_because: I want to make positive changes in other people's lives. I will begin a Global Cycle from the Arctic Circle, Canada in 2010 to raise awareness for global change and use the adventure as a beacon that will encourage donations ($1 will do!) that keep on giving in the Kiva lending program (READ MORE ABOUT KIVA - THEN PLEASE DONATE TO THIS CHARITY RIDE). I believe from our hands, great things can happen in other people's lives just a few prayers away. I will support the Kiva foundation & ONE Cycle, One Man, One Charity in 2010 to make a global impact for those who need us the most. I'll ride the bike to inspire others to ride for charity, make a small donation (anything is more than nothing) and we'll see dreams happen.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hard working teacher, father, husband and I have dedicated my life to educating others to learn, think, better their lives. Giving at Kiva is a gift that will keep on giving, it just takes a spark to get it going!

lender.name: hakeon
lender.loan_because: i can't a imagine a more promising way to manifest the advantages our abilities to transcend barriers invites.

lender.name: Janet, Fredericton, Can.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ cares about the poor and suffering and would have us do something to help. This is a picture of me and my daughter.
lender.occupational_info: I help women who cannot clean their own house because of health problems.

lender.name: Alexander

lender.occupational_info: I am in my second year of college.

lender.name: dylan

lender.name: rolfsky
lender.loan_because: in comparison to the rest of the world, I have more money than I know what to do with.
lender.occupational_info: I help build websites.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I think that it's a nice present that keeps on giving. I give to Kiva each winter rather than buying Christmas presents. Whenever the loans get repaid, I can put that money back into the system so these presents really do last a long time.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: it was given as a graduation gift. I am not in a position to loan personally, but this gift enables me to help empower others. I will keep loaning it.

lender.name: Asbjorn and Anne-Grete
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.loan_because: I believe in the time honored saying "Give a man a fish, and feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetime."
lender.occupational_info: I count and keep track of other people's money.

lender.name: Karen

lender.occupational_info: I print catalogs and signs for a large chain of stores.

lender.name: Ben

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I believe we have a responsibility to give back to the world in ways that will improve the standard of living for this and future generations.

lender.name: King Christopher
lender.occupation: Head of State, Kingdom of Vikesland

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage entrepreneurship in developing countries.

lender.name: Mary

lender.name: Mrs. Eswine's class

lender.name: Therese

lender.occupational_info: I write science fiction and fantasy stories. It's fun, and sometimes I even get paid for it, which continues to amaze me. It's a great feeling to make money doing something you love. Writing is also something I can do in between my schoolwork, which has gotten heavier as I get closer to graduation.

lender.name: Ingvild
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together and everyone needs a little help at times.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the animal healthcare field and I love it!

lender.name: Joey

lender.name: Margaret

lender.name: COLLETTE
lender.loan_because: I believe in the philosophy of giving back to communities that are in need. The microloan concept can create positive economies in third world countries that never would have a chance otherwise.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a 4 year university that is a historically Black college. The students I serve come from needy backgrounds. I formerly was a principal in a middle school and was a teacher for over 14 years.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I love helping people that need help, And that would help other when they get up, God of Father was a giver and Jesus was a giver, If I want to get a head I have to become a giver.
lender.occupational_info: My work is servicing people every day.

lender.name: Ruth

lender.occupational_info: I work at a library where my job is to make it easier for people to borrow books, cds and dvds.

lender.name: Kari

lender.occupational_info: I help protect children and make sure their needs are met.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Ramit

lender.occupational_info:
I co-founded a company helping other business collaborate and share information.
I also started a website teaching people how to manage their money and accomplish their goals

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: For such a small contribution on my part, it can make such a big difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: microfinance is the most sustainable form of development that I've found, and I joined Kiva because there aren't any opportunities to work professionally in microfinance plus in Cincinnati.

lender.name: N.M.Y.
lender.loan_because: I like to help people succeed and accomplish their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I develop training courses to help educators learn how to implement innovative technology strategies in K-20.

lender.name: Grant & Lisa
lender.loan_because: part of our primary purpose here on earth is to help others. Everyone deserves a chance for a better life.

lender.name: ACCSR
lender.occupational_info: ACCSR helps organisations create lasting value through responsible business strategies and productive stakeholder relationships. lender.name: Paraag
lender.loan_because: I am.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: the love of Christ compels me.

lender.name: Keeley
lender.loan_because: It's Christmas time.

lender.name: Mick O
lender.loan_because: It really works!

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I have had the great pleasure of working overseas, in Ukraine, Indonesia, East Timor and Somalia, and can appreciate what a difference a small loan can make to those in need.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I want to know that what I am able to give helps another to better themselves and their family.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals that seem inclined to better their plight in life, I want to support this because it helps communities grow and prosper. Kiva represents the way that banking should work, building relationships with the borrower and understanding their needs. While governments pour money into failed big banks that pay ridiculous amounts to their investment managers, Kiva shows what responsible lending means.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a home that they purchase and can call their own

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to better themselves and follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am the corporate accountant for our family owned construction company. We build large commercial buildings such as motels, malls and car dealerships.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting one another in our dreams and aspirations--as well as helping others find productive ways to earn a living.
lender.occupational_info: I am a former corporate banker, mother of two teenagers, and I now work with schools to develop globally-connected, creative classrooms.

lender.name: sandomingo
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: unlearning a lifetime of errors

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: My husband comes from Mexico and is one of eleven children. I have heard about and seen the difficult life he had growing up and hope to help others improve their lives for the better, just like my husband has.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants in the United States. My students come from all over the world but are mostly from Latin America.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to play my part in the world by helping those in need. It's just the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Our company buys small community hospitals located in rural areas that are struggling. Our mission is to create quality local healthcare through trust and integrity in an environment that will successfully nurture healing.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I have travelled to the countries that I make loans to and I have seen first hand the benefits of micro-loaning

lender.name: Andrew
lender.occupational_info: I work in fast food....I make coffee and prepare sandwiches.
